mapper.update: update WEBPORTAL_CBASE_CONTAINER set CONTAINER_NAME=#{containerName}, MOUNT_DIR=#{mountDir}, IP_ADDR=#{ipAddr}, GATE_ADDR=#{gateAddr}, IP_MASK=#{ipMask}, TYPE=#{type}, DISK_SIZE=#{diskSize}, CORES_NUMBER=#{coresNumber}, CPU_SPEED=#{cpuSpeed}, MEMORY_SIZE=#{memorySize}, STATUS=#{status}, HOST_IP=#{hostIp}, HOST_ID=#{hostId}, CBASECLUSTER_ID=#{cbaseClusterId}, DELETED=#{deleted}, CREATE_TIME=#{createTime}, CREATE_USER=#{createUser}, UPDATE_TIME=now(), UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser} where ID=#{id}

update WEBPORTAL_CBASE_CONTAINER
CONTAINER_NAME=#{containerName},
MOUNT_DIR=#{mountDir},
IP_ADDR=#{ipAddr},
GATE_ADDR=#{gateAddr},
IP_MASK=#{ipMask},
TYPE=#{type},
DISK_SIZE=#{diskSize},
CORES_NUMBER=#{coresNumber},
MEMORY_SIZE=#{memorySize},
CPU_SPEED=#{cpuSpeed},
HOST_ID=#{hostId},
HOST_IP=#{hostIp},
CBASECLUSTER_ID=#{cbaseClusterId},
STATUS=#{status},
DELETED=#{deleted},
CREATE_TIME=#{createTime},
CREATE_USER=#{createUser},
UPDATE_TIME=now(),
UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser}
ZABBIXHOSTS=#{zabbixHosts}
where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select ID, CONTAINER_NAME, MOUNT_DIR, IP_ADDR, GATE_ADDR, IP_MASK, TYPE, DISK_SIZE, CORES_NUMBER, CPU_SPEED, MEMORY_SIZE, STATUS, HOST_IP, HOST_ID, CBASECLUSTER_ID, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, ZABBIXHOSTS from WEBPORTAL_CBASE_CONTAINER where ID = #{id}

select
from WEBPORTAL_CBASE_CONTAINER CCT where CCT.CONTAINER_NAME = #{containerName}

select
from WEBPORTAL_CBASE_CONTAINER CCT where CCT.CBASECLUSTER_ID=#{cbaseClusterId}

select ,n.CBASECLUSTER_NAME,h.HCLUSTER_NAME_ALIAS,n.HCLUSTER_ID from WEBPORTAL_CBASE_CONTAINER CCT left join WEBPORTAL_CBASECLUSTER_INFO n on n.ID = CCT.CBASECLUSTER_ID left join WEBPORTAL_HCLUSTER h on n.HCLUSTER_ID = h.ID
and n.CBASECLUSTER_NAME like CONCAT('%','${params.cbaseClusterName}','%') escape '^'
and h.HCLUSTER_NAME like CONCAT('%','${params.hclusterName}','%') escape '^'
ORDER BY CCT.CREATE_TIME DESC
limit #{page.startRowPosition},#{page.recordsPerPage}

select count(1) from WEBPORTAL_CBASE_CONTAINER CCT left join WEBPORTAL_CBASECLUSTER_INFO n on n.ID = CCT.CBASECLUSTER_ID left join WEBPORTAL_HCLUSTER h on n.HCLUSTER_ID = h.ID
and n.CBASECLUSTER_NAME like CONCAT('%','${cbaseClusterName}','%') escape '^'
and h.HCLUSTER_NAME like CONCAT('%','${hclusterName}','%') escape '^'
